notes.text: We now correctly truncate the quick view description
You can now configure the exportRequestSize parameter in tree and analytical tables using the Table building block or manifest.json file
We've resolved an issue in the Table building block API that prevented showing or hiding columns
We now ensure that the binding for the timezone property works correctly
The mass edit functionality now supports fields containing date-time values with time zones
We now ensure that the busy indicator is displayed during paste, drag, and move operations
We now migrated the FormElement Building Block to an extended UI5 control
Radio buttons now have tooltips
We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
We’ve resolved an error in the calculation of the column width in tables used within the value help
We've reintroduced the extension.additionalProperties property to ensure that analytical tables are correctly displayed
We've resolved an issue with the return of GetFilters
We now correctly set the width of radio buttons
Value help for multi-input fields now works correctly
We've resolved an issue where the type-ahead suggestions weren't shown when focusing on a field for the first time
We now ensure that the Edit button is enabled when no conditions are applied to it
We now ensure that properties are displayed with the correct labels in the p13n personalization dialog
We now emphasize semantic keys in a grid table when they have semantic objects
We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
We now avoid displaying empty brackets when the description is missing
We now ensure that the textFromValueList property is correctly used as fallback text for the field
We've resolved an issue where manifest settings weren't applied to charts on the object page
We've resolved an issue where the EditState filter didn’t behave correctly when used inside nested MultiFilters
We've introduced a toggle button on the column selection tab in the table's p13N dialog, to allow users to display description columns when needed
We now ensure using a binding expression for the readOnly property in the Field building block works correctly
